title: Upgrade claude-large from Opus 4.5 to Opus 4.6 on Bedrock
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Upgrades the 'claude-large' model alias to use the newly released Claude Opus 4.6 via AWS Bedrock.
gist.impact: Users accessing 'claude-large' will automatically benefit from the latest Opus capabilities while retaining existing pricing.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee upgrading a massive, glowing book or server labeled 'Opus'. Represents the transition to a smarter, newer version (4.6).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee placing a glowing golden chip into a high-tech server tower labeled 'Opus'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text '4.6'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
